column2: The most famous fictional coffee house in television history. The Friends hangout was so popular that real-life pop-up versions have opened over the years.
The place \where everybody knows your name.\""

The Acme Corporation is a fictional corporation that features prominently in the Road Runner/Wile E.
 Coyote animated shorts as a running gag. 
The company manufactures outlandish products that fail or backfire catastrophically at the worst possible times.
